full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BDE MCHOG RIM GNYIS KYI MTHA' DPYOD RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @030B (RIM GNYIS KYI MTHA' DPYOD RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI ^ CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I DGONGS PA JI LTA BA BZHIN DU, RJE BTZUN KUN DGA' BKRA SHIS KYI ZHAL SNGA NAS DGYES PA CHEN POS BKA' STZAL BA RNAMS, BDAG SNYOMS LAS PA ZHIG GIS, ,BRJED BYANG GI TSUL DU YI GER BKOD PA LA, GSANG BA'I BDAG PO DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE DANG, CHOS 'DI'I BDAG PO KYANG BAR BA, MA DANG MKHA' 'GRO CHOS SKYONG BSRUNG MA'I TSOGS YE SHES KYI SPYAN DANG LDAN PA RNAMS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZOD, ,BZOD NAS BDAG LA 'PHRAL GYI RKYEN DU GYUR BA DANG, GTAN GYI SGRIB PAR MI 'GYUR BAR BYIN GYIS @031A *, ,BRLAB PA'I SGO NAS, BDAG GI RNAM MANG RGYUD SDE'I DGONGS PA RGYAL BA KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DANG NGO BO DBYER MA MCHIS PA KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA DE NYID KYI DGONGS PA JI LTA BA BZHIN DU 'DZIN NUS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,RNAL 'BYOR MA RGYUD DUNG PHYUR PHRAG GCIG DANG, ,BYE BA PHRAG DRUG GSUNGS PA'I NANG NAS NI, RGYAL MTSAN TOG LTAR MTHO BA'I RGYUD KYI MCHOG ,DPAL LDAN 'KHOR LO SDOM PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG ,'DI BRIS DGE BAS RANG GI TSE DANG BSOD NAMS 'PHEL BA DANG, DGE 'DUN GYI DBU 'PHANG DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR SHOG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,(ZHES 'DI RJE KUN DGA' BKRA SHIS KYI GSUNG RGYUN ZIN BRIS LAGS, ,)
